options(scipen=999)
pfix = function(c,d){
    p = paste0("{",c,"}x^{",d,"}",collapse="+")
    p = gsub("x^{0}","",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{1}","x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("+{-","-{",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("+{1}x","+x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("-{1}x","-x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{-1}x","-x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{1}x","x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{1}","x¹",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{2}","x²",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{3}","x³",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{4}","x⁴",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{5}","x⁵",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{6}","x⁶",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{7}","x⁷",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{","",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("}","",p,fixed=T)
    return(p)
}
pfixmid = function(c,d){
    p = paste0("+{",c,"}x^{",d,"}",collapse="")
    p = gsub("x^{0}","",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{1}","x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("+{-","-{",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("+{1}x","+x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("-{1}x","-x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{-1}x","-x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{1}x","x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{1}","x¹",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{2}","x²",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{3}","x³",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{4}","x⁴",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{5}","x⁵",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{6}","x⁶",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{7}","x⁷",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("-{","-",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{","",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("}","",p,fixed=T)
    return(p)
}

while(T){
    a = sample(2:8,1)*sample(c(-1,1),1)
    qc = sample(2:9,3)*sample(c(-1,1),3,T)
    A = qc[1]
    B = qc[2]
    C = qc[3]
    cc = c(A,A*a+B,B*a+C,a*C)
    pc = pfix(cc,3:0)
    lb = pfix(c(1,a),c(1,0))
    ac1 = cc[1]
    ac2 = cc[2]
    ac3 = cc[3]
    ac4 = cc[4]
    ac5 = 1
    ac6 = a
    ac7 = cc[1]
    ac8 = cc[1]
    ac9 = cc[1]*a
    ac10 = cc[2]-ac9
    ac11 = cc[3]
    ac12 = ac10
    ac13 = ac12
    ac14 = a*ac12
    ac15 = ac11-ac14
    ac16 = cc[4]
    ac17 = ac15
    ac18 = ac15
    ac19 = ac17*a
    ac20 = ac16-ac19
    
    a1 = pfix(ac1,3)
    a2 = pfixmid(ac2,2)
    a3 = pfixmid(ac3,1)
    a4 = pfixmid(ac4,0)
    a5 = pfix(ac5,1)
    a6 = pfixmid(ac6,0)
    a7 = pfix(ac7,2)
    a8 = pfix(ac8,3)
    a9 = pfixmid(ac9,2)
    a10 = pfix(ac10,2)
    a11 = pfixmid(ac11,1)
    a12 = pfixmid(ac12,1)
    a13 = pfix(ac13,2)
    a14 = pfixmid(ac14,1)
    a15 = pfix(ac15,1)
    a16 = pfixmid(ac16,0)
    a17 = pfixmid(ac17,0)
    a18 = pfix(ac18,1)
    a19 = pfixmid(ac19,0)
    a20 = pfix(ac20,0)
    
    aac = c(ac1,ac2,ac3,ac4,ac5,ac6,ac7,ac8,ac9,ac10,
            ac11,ac12,ac13,ac14,ac15,ac16,ac17,ac18,ac19,ac20)
    aa = c(a1,a2,a3,a4,a5,a6,a7,a8,a9,a10,
            a11,a12,a13,a14,a15,a16,a17,a18,a19,a20)
    
    uac = sort(unique(c(aac,-aac)))
    chf = character()
    for(i in uac){
        for(d in 0:3){
            chf = c(chf,pfix(i,d))
        }
    }
    chf = unique(chf)
    alf = paste0("* ",chf,collapse="\n")
    
    chm = character()
    for(i in uac){
        for(d in 0:3){
            chm = c(chm,pfixmid(i,d))
        }
    }
    chm = unique(chm)
    alm = paste0("* ",unique(chm),collapse="\n")
    if(max(abs(uac))<100){break}
}

sols = character()
for(i in 1:20){

    } else {
        sols=c(sols,paste0(1*(aa[i]==chm),collapse=""))
    }
}
sols = paste0(sols,collapse="|")
